trans-unit.source: Specifies the file structure that will be used for the <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener"></xref> log.
trans-unit.target: Angir filen-strukturen som skal brukes for det <xref href="System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener"> </xref> loggen.

trans-unit.source: The TraceLogRetentionOption enumeration is used to specify the value of the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.TraceLogRetentionOption%2A> property in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener> class.
trans-unit.target: Opplistingen TraceLogRetentionOption brukes til å angi verdien for <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.TraceLogRetentionOption%2A>egenskapen i <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener>klasse.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.TraceLogRetentionOption%2A>

trans-unit.source: That property setting determines the possible and default values for the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumNumberOfFiles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> properties.
trans-unit.target: Egenskapsinnstillingen bestemmer mulig og standard verdier for den <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>og <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumNumberOfFiles%2A?displayProperty=fullName>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumNumberOfFiles%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: You can set the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize%2A> and <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumNumberOfFiles%2A> properties through the `maximumFileSize` and `maximumNumberOfFiles` custom attributes in the configuration file or by using the `maximumFileSize` or `maximumNumberOfFiles` parameters in the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.%23ctor%2A> constructor.
trans-unit.target: Du kan angi den <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize%2A>og <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumNumberOfFiles%2A>Egenskaper via den `maximumFileSize` og `maximumNumberOfFiles` egendefinerte attributter i konfigurasjonsfilen eller via den `maximumFileSize` eller `maximumNumberOfFiles` parameterne i det <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.%23ctor%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumNumberOfFiles%2A> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize%2A>

trans-unit.source: If the `maximumFileSize` or `maximumNumberOfFiles` attributes in the configuration file specify an out-of-range value, the properties are set to their default values.
trans-unit.target: Hvis den `maximumFileSize` eller `maximumNumberOfFiles` attributter i konfigurasjonsfilen angi en verdi utenfor området, egenskapene er angitt til standardverdiene.

trans-unit.source: If you specify an out-of-range value in the `maximumFileSize` or `maximumNumberOfFiles` parameter when you call the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.%23ctor%2A> constructor, an <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> is thrown.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du angir en verdi utenfor området i den `maximumFileSize` eller `maximumNumberOfFiles` parameteren når du kaller den <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.%23ctor%2A>konstruktøren, en <xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException>forårsakes.</xref:System.ArgumentOutOfRangeException> </xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.%23ctor%2A>

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the possible and default values for file size and file count that are associated with each trace log retention option.
trans-unit.target: Tabellen nedenfor viser mulig og standard verdiene for filstørrelsen og antall filer som er knyttet til hver loggen oppbevaringsperioden sporingsalternativet.

trans-unit.source: "N/A" indicates that the associated property is not checked for that TraceLogRetentionOption value.
trans-unit.target: "Ikke tilgjengelig" indikerer at den tilknyttede egenskapen ikke er kontrollert for TraceLogRetentionOption verdien.

trans-unit.source: |TraceLogRetentionOption|Maximum file size|Default file size|Maximum number of files|Default number of files| |-----------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------|-----------------------------| |LimitedCircularFiles|N/A|-1|N/A|1| |LimitedSequentialFiles|>0|4 kB|N/A|1| |SingleFileBoundedSize|>0|4 kB|N/A|-1| |SingleFileUnboundedSize|>0|4 kB|>0|1| |UnlimitedSequentialFiles|>0|4 kB|>1|2|
trans-unit.target: | TraceLogRetentionOption | Maksimal filstørrelse | Standard filstørrelsen | Maksimalt antall filer | Antall filer som standard | |-----------------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------|-----------------------------|-----------------------------| | LimitedCircularFiles | IKKE TILGJENGELIG | -1 | IKKE TILGJENGELIG |&1; | | LimitedSequentialFiles | >&0; |&4; kB | IKKE TILGJENGELIG |&1; | | SingleFileBoundedSize | >&0; |&4; kB | IKKE TILGJENGELIG | -1 | | SingleFileUnboundedSize | >&0; |&4; kB | >&0; |&1; | | UnlimitedSequentialFiles | >&0; |&4; kB | >&1; |&2; |

trans-unit.source: A finite number of sequential files, each with a maximum file size.
trans-unit.target: Et begrenset antall sekvensielle filer, hver med en maksimal filstørrelse.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize*> property value is reached, writing starts in a new file with an incremented integer suffix. When the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumNumberOfFiles*> property value is reached, the first file is cleared and overwritten.
trans-unit.target: Når den <> </> *> egenskapsverdien er nådd, skriving starter i en ny fil med en økt heltall-suffiks. Når den <> </> *> egenskapsverdien er nådd, blir den første filen er fjernet og overskrives.

trans-unit.source: Files are then incrementally overwritten in a circular manner.
trans-unit.target: Filene blir deretter trinnvis overskrevet på en sirkulær måte.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: A finite number of sequential files, each with a maximum file size.
trans-unit.target: Et begrenset antall sekvensielle filer, hver med en maksimal filstørrelse.

trans-unit.source: When the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize*> property value is reached, writing starts in a new file with an incremented integer suffix.
trans-unit.target: Når den <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize*>egenskapsverdien er nådd, skriving starter i en ny fil med en økt heltall-suffiks.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: One file with a maximum file size that is determined by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: En fil med en maksimal filstørrelse som fastsettes av den <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: One file with no maximum file size restriction.
trans-unit.target: En fil med ingen maksimale størrelsesbegrensningen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: An unlimited number of sequential files, each with a maximum file size that is determined by the <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize*> property.
trans-unit.target: Et ubegrenset antall sekvensielle filer, hver med en maksimal filstørrelse som fastsettes av den <xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize*>egenskapen.</xref:System.Diagnostics.EventSchemaTraceListener.MaximumFileSize*>

trans-unit.source: There is no logical bound to the number or size of the files, but it is limited by the physical constraints imposed by the computer.
trans-unit.target: Det er ingen logiske grense nummeret eller størrelsen på filene, men det er begrenset av fysiske begrensninger som er pålagt av datamaskinen.

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
